# Openrouter Performance Tuning

## Overview

This skill covers performance optimization techniques including connection pooling, async processing, and caching strategies.

## Prerequisites

- OpenRouter integration
- Performance baseline measurements

## Instructions

Follow these steps to implement this skill:

1. **Verify Prerequisites**: Ensure all prerequisites listed above are met
2. **Review the Implementation**: Study the code examples and patterns below
3. **Adapt to Your Environment**: Modify configuration values for your setup
4. **Test the Integration**: Run the verification steps to confirm functionality
5. **Monitor in Production**: Set up appropriate logging and monitoring

## Reference Guides

- [Latency Optimization](references/latency-optimization.md) — Connection pooling, async concurrency
- [Request Optimization](references/request-optimization.md) — Token minimization, streaming for perceived speed
- [Caching Strategies](references/caching-strategies.md) — Response caching, semantic caching
- [Batch Processing](references/batch-processing.md) — Efficient concurrent batching
- [Configuration Tuning](references/configuration-tuning.md) — Performance profiles (latency, throughput, cost, quality)
- [Model Selection for Speed](references/model-selection-for-speed.md) — Fast model options and selection
- [Monitoring & Profiling](references/monitoring-and-profiling.md) — Latency tracking, performance metrics
- [Best Practices Summary](references/best-practices-summary.md) — Quick-reference performance tips
